text:
@SenThomTillis @realDonaldTrump What was NOT said last night. COVID-19 can infect Americans in other infected countries, this travel ban wouldn’t stop them from coming back into the US.
The virus is HERE. We need medical preparedness. Do what CDC says to do, don’t hoard what others also need, and don’t panic.
